review: every so often a game comes along, a game unlike any other,a game that can make you so happy that your eye balls explode from your head,Star Wars BattleFront II is this exact game.as a first look of the game on steam, i thought it looked pretty dull, and being the star wars fan i was, i didnt want to waste my money on a star wars game that would ruin things for the franchise. however being an expert yoloist i decided that you  have got to take some risks, and so i bought it.THIS GAME IS AWESOME!!! play as a clone and KICK THE S*IT out of droids, play as a jedi and 1 hit kill EVERYTHING, THE POSSIBILITIES!!! this game for me was based on the graphics and the gameplay, the graphics well, being made 10 years ago, are pretty good. and the gameplay is just so amazing i found myself in tons of positions where my heart is pounding out of its chest because i wanted to win so badly.all in all this game really won me over, and i mean this game is even a bargain at $10, if you are a star wars fan, GET THIS GAME! you will love it 9.5/10 BRING BACK THE MULTIPLAYERS!!!

First off let me tell you that this is one of the best games i have ever played,it is brilliant, fantastic, awesome and just wonderful.i love this game so much that i have it on three consoles :Dif you ever have a chance to buy this please do its amazinghow many of you have ever wanted to have a lightsaber in your hand, ever wanted to use the force, or even blast the crap out of some droids or stormtroopers... well this game is the closest your ever gonna get. some challenging puzzles, build awesome stuff and even create your own JEDI :D

PORTAL,portal is a physics based puzzle game, that turns games that you would think to be boring (in a category so) and makes them fun. there are 19 levels in portal each with its own fun and excitement.i think this is a great little story game and is deffinetly recommended 9/10
